Description: Pottery ostracon bearing 7 lines of Greek text on the recto and 3 lines on the verso, containing Psalms 90.7-11.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr William Yewdale Adams
Curator's comments: For relationship to EA 82388, see Ruffini forthcoming in JJP.
Bibliographic references: Adams 2002 / Merinarti III: The Late and Terminal Christian Phases (118, pl.38c, d)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (395073) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/395073)
